title: DarkStar Alliance

embed.description: For Australia and NZ MWO, Star Citizen and other gaming, come visit the Darkstar Alliance

body:
DarkStar Alliance is a Aus/NZ casual gaming org with Teamspeak, Discord and forums.
_While our League focus is OCE, our player base is world wide._

We have a mature and relaxed atmosphere. Our members play a broad range of games.
_DSA was founded back in 1999 so we're well established and we're here to stay._

> We host both competitive and silly events [**FRIDAY NIGHTS**](http://www.darkstar-alliance.com/forum/m/27249981/viewforum/6040265) every week at 8pm (Sydney time), such as 1v1 and 2v2 knockout tournaments, internal 5s, and Custom Game Modes (eg. Ultimate Bravery), and have regular **PRIZES and GIVEAWAYS** for our participating members.
> 
> If you're looking for more serious play, we host scheduled DSA Ranked 5s Team nights every week as well as impromptu ranked 5s games at any time. The team roster is open to substitutions every fortnight, so if you're keen to be on the team, come along to events and show us what you're made of!

**If you would like to visit before deciding to sign up**
1. just jump on Teamspeak (preferred) or [Discord](https://discord.gg/CV9Hzqw), links on [**DSA home page**](http://www.darkstar-alliance.com/home), halfway down on the right.

**If you would like to join**
1. Visit our website and register via the recruitment tab - http://darkstar-alliance.com/recruitment
2. If you haven't already, download teamspeak - https://www.teamspeak.com/downloads
3. Bookmark DSA in teamspeak, there is a link on the right hand side, mid way down on the DSA home page.
4. Get your permissions setup on teamspeak by jumping on and introducing yourself or posting on the forums.

Visitors are always welcome to hang out and kick some butt.
No matter what you're into, casual or hardcore, come check us out!

replies.body:
Alrighty. It's been a while since we've run active events for DSA LoL, and if you ask me, I think we're overdue. One broken computer down, 6 months later with many combined frankenstein computer parts, and we're back online! {{champion:83}} 

> In the coming weeks we'll be congratulating our winners of DSA Fridays Season 1, and smashing out some more casual nights each week, as well as internals, dynamic ranked, and mini-tourneys. On top of that, the start of DSA Season 2 is just around the corner.
> 
> **This week, lets kick it off with a mix: Battle Royale, Baron/Spider Rush, and Yordle-topia! We'll be meeting up @ 8pm Sydney time.**

If you've never hung out with us before, feel free to jump on anytime and say hello, and we'll get some games in. :D

http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/2013/08/underwear-dance.gif
My body is ready. bags being on BlackTeacup's team.
Never played battle royale before. Just googled it. Looks awesome :D

This GIF HOLY I CANT STOP WATCHING 

> http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/2013/08/underwear-dance.gif
The worst is when you watch him in the dark after midnight. My family must never know...

TONIGHT, we're running the famous **HIDE AND SEEK** game mode, for the first time ever in DSA. Come along for the shenanigans, @8pm Sydney time Fri 10/2/17

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Yeah guys be there or be square, this shit is lit. We are the best, teacups mum is even better.
Hot diggity, i cant wait!!!! Finally get to hide from the predators of DSA, be there or be square, this will be a blast!

Alright Chumps and Chumpettes. This Friday we'll be running custom games of **Draft Racing**, followed by Mr Myagi's **Creeps Monopoly**, kicking off on Friday @ 8pm Sydney time.

I also hear from the whispers through the internet cables that we're coming up to in-house tournament time once again.  Last year's tourney was a stack of fun for the 10 or so teams that competed, and I'm sure this year will be no different.

Feel free to jump on TS with us and join in! there's always folks online looking for a game or two. :D
Keen! Last round of customs with you guys was awesome!
Yeah this is a sick place guys. Fun to play either serious ranked game, mucking around games and they even do custom games.

DSA LoL Friday Custom Gamemode- ASCENSION BRAWL!! Come for a teamfight fiesta @8PM Sydney time tonight
Tonight marks the start of Season 2 DSA LoL!

http://darkstar-alliance.com/forum/m/27249981/viewthread/25194955-friday-event-nights-custom-game-modes-win-prizes
